gw.api.domain

Interface ModifiableAdapter


  • public interface ModifiableAdapter
    The interface that must be implemented by entities which delegate to Modifiable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToModifiers(Modifier element)
      Adds the given Modifier to the Modifiable.
      Modifier createRawModifier()
      Instantiates a new Modifier of the appropriate subtype for this Modifiable.
      Modifier[] getAllModifiers()
      Returns the Modifier array on the Modifiable.
      PolicyLine getPolicyLine()
      Returns the PolicyLine of the Modifiable, or null if the Modifiable is not associated with a PolicyLine.
      PolicyPeriod getPolicyPeriod()
      Returns the PolicyPeriod of the Modifiable.
      java.util.Date getReferenceDateInternal()
      Returns the internal reference date persisted on the Modifiable.
      Jurisdiction getState()
      Returns the Jurisdiction of the Modifiable.
      void postUpdateModifiers()
      Executes custom logic after modifiers are updated on the Modifiable.
      void removeFromModifiers(Modifier element)
      Removes the given Modifier from the Modifiable.
      void setReferenceDateInternal(java.util.Date date)
      Sets the internal reference date of the Modifiable.

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyLine

        PolicyLine getPolicyLine()
        Returns the PolicyLine of the Modifiable, or null if the Modifiable is not associated with a PolicyLine.

      • getPolicyPeriod

        PolicyPeriod getPolicyPeriod()
        Returns the PolicyPeriod of the Modifiable. Must not return null.

      • getState

        Jurisdiction getState()
        Returns the Jurisdiction of the Modifiable.

      • getAllModifiers

        Modifier[] getAllModifiers()
        Returns the Modifier array on the Modifiable.

      • addToModifiers

        void addToModifiers(Modifier element)
        Adds the given Modifier to the Modifiable.

      • removeFromModifiers

        void removeFromModifiers(Modifier element)
        Removes the given Modifier from the Modifiable.

      • createRawModifier

        Modifier createRawModifier()
        Instantiates a new Modifier of the appropriate subtype for this Modifiable.

      • postUpdateModifiers

        void postUpdateModifiers()
        Executes custom logic after modifiers are updated on the Modifiable.

      • getReferenceDateInternal

        java.util.Date getReferenceDateInternal()
        Returns the internal reference date persisted on the Modifiable. This date should be null for all newly created Modifiables in an unbound job, and for all Modifiables in a Rewrite or Renewal. Conversely the date should be non-null for all Modifiables in a bound PolicyPeriod and for pre-existing Modifiables in an unbound midterm change.

      • setReferenceDateInternal

        void setReferenceDateInternal(java.util.Date date)
        Sets the internal reference date of the Modifiable. This is called when binding a PolicyPeriod if the Modifiable's internal reference date is not already set, and when creating a new policy term to clear the persisted date.
